game.shortDescription: In Broken World: Save Your Children, you play as Josh, a father fighting to keep his kids alive in a zombie apocalypse. Manage resources, build shelters, and set traps as you cross an infested city to reach the airport and reunite with your wife. Every choice matters survive at any cost.
